PropertyGroup.PackageReleaseNotes: Bugfix release for Incrementalist v0.1.6 Fixed [Bug: in multi-targeted projects, only one "project" contains the dependency graph.](https://github.com/petabridge/Incrementalist/issues/63). This will make it easier for Incrementalist to detect changes that occur inside multi-targeted projects.
PropertyGroup.tags: build, msbuild, incremental build, roslyn, git
